jobDescription: DescriptionTrinityRail is searching for a Senior Data Analyst. The successful candidate will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. The candidate will also be responsible for a $100mm maintenance expense budget, strategic plan and forecast, utilizing statistical models to forecast expenses up to 5 years out. The candidate will provide insights on cost reduction opportunities to the fleet maintenance group. The analyst should have experience in data mining and transformation, creating visualizations, and statistical analysis.
